headline: PPG and Tasca Racing gear up for 2025 drag racing season
summary: STRONGSVILLE, Ohio, February 06, 2025--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced that it has extended its sponsorship of the Tasca Racing team for the 2025 season. The eye-catching PPG NITRO MUSTANG® DARK HORSE® Funny Car will be on the track for four events this year, including three NATIONAL HOT ROD ASSOCIATION® (NHRA®) Mission Foods Drag Racing Series races.

headline: PPG Unveils Non-BPA HOBA Coatings for Aluminum Bottles
summary: PPG Hoba coatings are intended for monobloc aerosols, collapsible tubes and aluminum bottles and offer improved interior protection.
